text_block_list.name: Young Girl
text_block_list.text: Hurry up, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
That dream again. I'm always<n>chasing her in it. Every step I
take is<n>so satisfying. So sweet. But...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's just a dream now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's a stir of excitement on the<n>training course, and one
runner is at<n>the center of it all.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
That's Narita Brian. She hasn't<n>debuted yet, but just look at
that<n>imposing demeanor.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
I guess the rumors are true—she's<n>challenging prizewinners
to unofficial<n>races!

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
How about we set the distance to<n>whatever you're best at?
Which I'd<n>say is... 2,000 meters?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Can you offer a serious challenge at<n>that distance?

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Sure, if it's against you. I'm the<n>experienced runner here,
so it's only<n>fair I give you a handicap. That's<n>
non-negotiable if I'm going to accept<n>this race.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Fine, if you insist.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wooo! Hayahide, here! Over here!<n>Brian's race is starting!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Ticket. The volume of your<n>yelling is more than
sufficient, so<n>would you kindly lower it?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoa, whoa—how could I keepquiet?! Her opponent today issuper strong!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Brian's a tough cookie, but if she<n>fails big-time, she's
gonna be<n>seriously bummed out!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: She will not.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm more acquainted with Brian's<n>ability than anyone. I also
know the<n>burden she bears because of it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
(She's way ahead. Her hair and tail<n>are waving in the
wind...)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
(They say she races at the G1 level,<n>so her talent is no
fluke. Which means<n>I don't need... to hold back!)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: ...There she is.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Waaagh! H-Hayahide! They're<n>already past the last turn,
but look at<n>the gap between them now...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes, Brian is far behind. Any normal<n>runner wouldn't be
able to make up<n>that distance...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But she is no normal runner.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thud, thud, thud!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what the heck?! That speed is<n>crazy! She'll catch up at
this rate!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Three lengths... Two lengths... Whoa,<n>she's already in
passing range! Geez,<n>this Brian's amazing!

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Agh... No way... I was in total control<n>of this race! How can a
pre-debut<n>rookie... possibly... catch up to me?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: (You're strong, all right.)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
(So keep letting me chase you like<n>this. Don't let me pass
you just yet.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Whoosh!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: (Show me all the fight that's in you.<n>Maybe then...)

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Wha?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: (It always happens right here...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thud, thud... thud... thud...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
(How many times have I seen this<n>moment—when the fire in
their eyes<n>goes out, swallowed up by<n>darkness? Too
many to count...)

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian slowed down right before<n>the finish... I guess
she ran out of<n>stamina at the last moment.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Th-then the winner is...

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Wheeze, pant... wheeze...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Ah, there you are! What were you<n>thinking accepting a race
without<n>talking to me first?!

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text: I'm... s-sorry.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Still, I'm impressed. She may be<n>inexperienced, but beating
her in a<n>2,000-meter race is no small feat! You<n>did we—

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Stop, please. She's so much better<n>than me, it wasn't even
a real race...<n>at all!

text_block_list.name: Senior Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
That was no win! I should never...<n>have gone up against a
beast like that!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoa... What's up with this mood?<n>How come the winner
isn't even a<n>little happy?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Because she saw it. When you<n>experience an
insurmountable power<n>up close, what you feel isn't<n>
excitement—it's fear.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
A beast who instills despair in<n>everyone she faces... That's
Narita<n>Brian—my sister.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The race is over and an eerie silence<n>falls over what was,
seconds before,<n>an exciting competition.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's rumored even amongst trainers<n>that her talent is
immeasurable. That's<n>why I came here today—to see it for<n>
myself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But still, her race caught me off<n>guard—both in how she
stalled out<n>after that beautiful final sprint and the<n>pained
look on her face after.
choice_data_list:
Maybe I can figure her out if we talk
face-to-face.

Maybe I can figure her out if we talk
face-to-face.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In my time here, no encounter has<n>ever been as strange
and confusing<n>as my first experience seeing Narita<n>Brian.
